seo: apache solr,未授权访问,漏洞检测,端口扫描
seo_en: apache solr, unauthorized access, vulnerability detection, port scanning
summary: 该插件用于检测Apache Solr是否存在未授权访问漏洞，通过访问特定URL并检查返回的JSON数据和关键字来确认漏洞是否存在。
summary_en: This plugin is used to detect whether there is an unauthorized access vulnerability in Apache Solr by accessing a specific URL and checking the returned JSON data and keywords to confirm the existence of the vulnerability.
